author: garvitaa
body:
#### PR description:
- Added Jet efficiency, Jet Purity and PU Jet rate plots to the pfValidation.
- Added some intermediate plots for different settings (mean, and median) to calculate response.
- Also added pv_z distribution.

Should be able to produce validation plots with pv_z, et efficiency, Jet Purity and PU Jet rate distributions.

#### PR validation:
Ran scram tests, produced the validation plots successfully and presented at PFlow meeting (https://indico.cern.ch/event/1050783/#3-studying-the-hgcal-and-hf-hg)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
NA
title: Adding jet efficiency and purity plots
